title: Relates to leave for organ or bone marrow donation granted to state employees
summary: Makes the provisions relating to leave for organ or bone marrow donation granted to state employees retroactive to August 29, 2001.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          171

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CAHILL -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Labor

       AN  ACT  to  amend the labor law, in relation to leave for organ or bone
         marrow donation granted to state employees

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section 202-b of the labor law is amended by adding a new
    2  subdivision 4 to read as follows:
    3    4. THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION SHALL  APPLY  RETROACTIVELY  TO  ANY
    4  EMPLOYEE  THAT HAS MADE A BONE MARROW OR ORGAN DONATION NO MORE THAN ONE
    5  YEAR PRIOR TO AUGUST TWENTY-NINTH, TWO THOUSAND ONE.
    6    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately and shall be deemed to  be
    7  in full force and effect as of August 29, 2001.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01153-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to leave for organ or bone marrow donation granted to state employees
